description: For controlling Eltako actuators like FD62NPN, FSR61, FUD61NPN via F6-02 RPS telegrams. Use this profile for actuators that respond to wall switch commands.

switch.name: Switch
switch.description: On/Off control - sends RPS rocker switch commands to actuator

rssi.name: RSSI
rssi.description: Signal strength (only if device sends feedback)

on.description: Press rocker A0 (top) to turn ON

off.description: Press rocker A1 (bottom) to turn OFF
